lac.data

Class ArffDataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • lac.data.Dataset
      • lac.data.ArffDataset

  • public class ArffDataset
extends Dataset
    Class containing the logic to read an ARFF format. The specification for this file could be found on the following link: https://www.cs.waikato.ac.nz/~ml/weka/arff.html

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ArffDataset(java.lang.String path)
      Constructor for the dataset.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ArffDataset

        public ArffDataset(java.lang.String path)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructor for the dataset. It reads from disk the dataset, and generates an object in main memory with all the information contained in the dataset
        Parameters:
        path - of the dataset to be read
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
